hospitals.rationale: Located in Old Dhaka East underserved area, would serve 45,000 additional people within 1km radius
Strategic location in Lalbagh area to serve flood-prone community, 35,000 people coverage

waste_facilities.rationale: Tejgaon North collection point would reduce waste transport distance for 25,000 residents
